content.detailedDescription:
In this light the ufo film with my cell phone from sony ericsson w810, one night we went to observe ufos mariano escobedo, ver. because the brightness of the sky is minimal compared with the city of orizaba, one can observe that the ufo is very low, almost over the houses, was suddenly shut down and we did not see where he went, then accompanied me camacho abel pacheco. 

date: april 10, 2007. 

report and video: rossana tejeda lopez of the orizaba's sleepy tejeda
content.summary: Ufo bright in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
It appeared about 1 mile away on the horizon above the ocean south of cabo
then it moved about a mile east just above the coastline.
then within a second it appeared about a mile straight above me then it moved about a mile out to original position straight south of cabo about 400 yards above the ocean each time it moved it flashed about 10 times then moved super fast to next location flashed about 10 x then moved again


answers to questions left of page


i was on my ocean front balcony star gazing i am an amateur  astronomer
i thought it was an aircraft but the speeds were imposable once it moved 

it was a clear night it flashed very brilliantly then it vanished
content.summary: Orange bright starlike
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: On friday 7/18 i walked outside and seen a solid white/gold color light going west to east and it looked like a star. it did not look like any normal plane and my house is under the greater pitt landing route and there are several fly over routes over my house and it did not resemble normal high altitude planes. i ran in the house and my wife and i watched the light disappear from our back deck. this all took about a minute for it to go horizon to horizon. this passed over the house at 9:52 pm and shortly there after i watched an arriving flight fly over my house which would have been i guess flight 5732 or 1794. it was about twice the size and brightness of saturn. my impression was it was flying in the 30000 foot range based on the fly over plane routes over my house are about 35000 feet this was only my impression of it's height. i have seen the spacelab and military planes pass over the house and it did not resemble any of these. i also have seen a fireball and many shooting stars and it did not resemble these. it had a straight smooth flight path with no normal lighting a plane would have. a plane flying a fly over route over my house takes about 4 or 5 minutes once spotted on the horizon to go out of site on the other horizon. you can usually hear the planes faintly this object made no sound.
content.summary: White/gold star like object passed over my house going from west horizon to east horizon in less than a minute.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on mo-pac fwy heading south towards austin and i saw a thin silver shape. it was small and looked to be quite a long distant away. in my sight it looked to be about an inch long so it's hard to tell really how big it was. it matched the appearance of a plane landing or taking off from bergstrom intl airport. it then rotated and showed its shape to be a solid circular disk. it shifted slightly and vanished. the only other person in my vehicle was my 5 year-old daughter and she didnt see it.
content.summary: I saw a thin silver object west of the austin skyline. it looked like a commercial jet until it rotated showing its shape to be a circular disk. it shifted and vanished

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were having a conversation in my back yard when i happened to look up and saw a green colored orb at the 9:00 position. i alerted my friend and we watched the object move clock-wise across the horizon. the object moved from a slow rate of speed to very fast as we lost sight of it. i have seen many shooting stars, satellites and comets, but my friend and i are quite certain it was neither of these. i have never before witnessed anything similar. the sighting left both of us speechless and a bit disturbed.
content.summary: A friend and i watched a green colored orb move across the horizon at a varying speed

content.detailedDescription:
I have reported this before however i did not realize that it was in all of the pictures that i took at that location. please see attached photos and form your own opinion. it is a very small sphere in all of the photos except in the one photo. it did appear to be moving in a flight path over the cemetary. the first photo i took was of the sacajawea cemetary sign as we were entering the parking lot. the object is in the distance to the left of the sign above the power poles. 
the next picture was of the three head stones and the object is to the right of the center headstone. it looks like a disc in this one. much more pronounced.
the next photo was of sacajawea's headstone by it self, the object is to the left of the headstone just above the hill and further aware. 
the last photo is of sacajawea's monument, if you look in the distance behind her you can see the sphere again to the left almost even with her right elbow. you will have to zoom in on these that was the only way that i discovered them. i dont know what this is but i do believe that this is a ufo. i am going to view the other photos that were taken by others that were with me. i did not see it while we were there. i realized that it was in the photo after we got home from vacation. if you do not get the photos please contact me and perhaps i can email them directly to an email address.

thank you
duane largent
content.summary: Looked like a sphere at one point in the photos and a disc in another.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out in the driveway at roughly 10:40pm, having a cigarette. it was warm and humid, and there was farily thick but broken cloud coverage. there was very little air movement or breeze. we were both looking at the sky, as that is what we normally do while out smoking. i was looking in one direction,(southeast) and my husband was looking in another (north), when my husband shouted "look!" and pointed to the sky. i turned quickly and immediately saw what he was pointing at. 

we witnessed an object flying well underneath the clouds, though neither my husband or i are able to give even a rough altitude. although it appeared as though it might have been at a rough altitude of where private small propellor planes often fly, while circling to land at the near-by air strip. 

the object was grey or light grey against the cloudy background. it had no lights or reflectors of any kind, and we were also unable to determine exactly what kind of shape the object was. my husband, who saw the object a few seconds longer than me, says that at least the back-side of the object was almost rectangular in shape. i was unable to decide on any shape, personally, though it was clearly a solid shape. 

it was moving in a northwest direction at a very quick speed, but was moving perfectly smooth and steady in a very straight line. if i were to compare the speed of the object we saw to the speed of an aircraft, it would be similiar to the speed of a fighter jet, (i.E. f-15, not 737.) we witnessed the object only for a few seconds, and then lost sight of it past our neighbor's roof.

guelph, ontario, is roughly 75km from toronto, which has a large airport. guelph also has it's own very small air strip. due to this we see alot of activitiy in the air on a daily basis. (also, i grew up in duluth minnesota, where there is an airport and air force base, so i have spent my entire life seeing aircraft of all sorts in the skies.) 

my husband and i do not feel what we saw last night was a plane or jet of any kind. i felt 100% certain of that even while i was looking at the object in the sky. no lights, or distinct airplane shape (wings) and the biggest, no sound. 

guelph also has quite a few industrial buildings, so there is continuous background noise, however it was very quiet last night due to it being a sunday, and the near-by plants do not run on the weekends. even with the normal industrial hum always in the background, we are able to hear passenger planes high above the clouds coming and going from the toronto airport, and often have small private planes flying over our house coming to and from the small air strip just outside of town. so, this object we witnessed last night being completely silent really sticks out in our minds.

we also do not believe the object was a bird of any kind. birds flying have distinct characteristics, such as gliding with or against the wind, flapping wings, and variations in speed. the object we saw did not have any of those characteristics, as it moved with one, quick, speed and remained in a perfectly straight and smooth line for the entire duration of our witnessing it.

i have been interested in the ufo phenomena for some time, (which is why i always keep my eyes to the sky when i'm outside), and have never seen anything unexplainable, until last night. my husband has never seen anything unexplainable either, though he does not generally look as much as i do, until last night. i never really put alot of thought into how i would react in the case i actually did see what i was looking for. i could not tell you what my initial thoughts were, but it did make my heart skip a beat, and interestingly brought a tear to my eye. my husband was not quite as "touched", as his first thoughts were "wow, a ufo".
content.shape: Cigar,  Egg,  Square,  Rectagular,  Teardrop,  Unknown
content.summary: Grey object,  moving quickly, silently, and smoothly, no lights or reflectors,

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on a lawn chair in the backyard in windham nh. it was a beautiful day, the sky was a deep blue and the clouds were few and far between. i was staring up in the sky specifically looking for any odd craft like objects which i have done many times before. i could see typical airplanes fly by periodically. all of a sudden my eyes caught the object, it was like a small silver ball bearing, it wasnt moving. it was very high in the sky, further than any of the planes that i saw. it must of been several miles up. it didnt move at all. i looked around to see if there were any stars out but it was the middle of tha day, there were no stars. i could see regular airplanes and they were moving, this object was not. maybe it was a satelite? anyway, i watched it for about 10 minutes. some clouds came by and covered the object, when the clouds disappeared it was gone. i layed there and look for it for another 15 to 20 minutes. it was gone. then after about 20 minutes it reappeared just a little further south east. it stayed in the sky for several minutes and then was covered by clouds, i didnt see it again.
content.summary: Silver ball bearing, several miles in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
La tarde del martes 17 de mayo de 2006 el joven jos��� ram���n villarreal ortega, quien es miembro del ovni club nuevo le���n, capt��� en video a una aparente entidad voladora no identificada, que volaba de este a oeste sobre el cerro de las mitras, a la altura de la colonia cumbres, en monterrey. el caso fue llamado como "la bruja de las mitras" o "la bruja de monterrey" en los medios de comunicaci���n.  

the afternoon from tuesday may 17, 2006 the young jose ramon villarreal ortega, who is member of new ovni club leon, caught on video apparent unidentified flying entity , it flying east to west on cerro of mitras, the height of the colonia cumbres in monterrey. the case was named as "the witch of the mitras" or "the witch of monterey" in the media.
content.summary: Ven "bruja" volando sobre el cerro de las mitras.

content.detailedDescription: La noche del domingo 28 de enero de 1996, alrededor de las 8:00pm, miles de personas en nuevo le���n observaron el paso de un extra���o objeto valoador no identificada envuelto en llamas, que iba dejando una estela de chispas a su paso. su trayectoria era de noroeste hacia el sureste. seg���n varios testigos, el objeto llameante cruz��� el cielo a gran velocidad y en su recorrido parec���an desbaratarse, dejando escapar a su paso destellos similares a las lluvias de estrellas o bengalas. las im���genes de este objeto fueron captados por muchos medios de comunicaci���n de monterrey. el ovni continu��� su vuelo hasta internarse en territorio del estado de san luis potos���.
content.summary: Un objeto en llamas cruza los cielos de nuevo león.

content.detailedDescription: I looked at the sky before i was going to bed when i saw a bright star i thought it was just the north star but then i look out the other window and saw that it was on the other side. i immediately woke up my family and showed this thing to them. we could not figure it out, i watched it for over a 30 minutes and it didnt move so it wasnt a airplane or helicopter.  now the most common answer to this is that its just a star and the red i was seeing is just the solar flares. although this wasnt at the altitude of all the other stars and in fact i saw the exact same object farther from where i was flying at the same altitude.  i really want to figure at what this thing was and i wouldnt be surprised if anyone else saw it. it was very bright and stayed up there for over an hour. after watching the object for over and hour i thought i was going to have a seisure with the pulsating lights.  i tried to rest my eyes for a little bit and then wake up when it was lighter out to see what this thing was. unfortanetly i feel asleep.
content.summary: Pulsating red and white lights over trees(non moving)

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9pm on july 18, 2008 the dogs were barking and growling, so i went into my office to look out the west facing window, and saw no one.  further to the west i saw a bright yellow-white light descending toward the earth.  this light was approx. 1/2 inch long and maybe 100 ft. up, and was descending straight down, like a vtol does.
about a half mile from my house is a pg&e sub=station, then a bare field of 5-6 acres, then an orchard.  there is a house in the trees, but between what would be my line of sight and the house is another bldg. so i doubt i could see those lights.  there is a light from a service station at the corner that i see all the time, but this new light was several hundred ft. north of that light.  i could see both lights.
i watchd this for 30-45 min. during which time it dimmed several times, and once blinked out completely.
this morning i dared to drive down the dirt road, but could see not difinitive evidence of a landing.  perhaps though i was not at the right spot.


i also had another sighting on 7-9-2008, that may be related in some way.
at 3 am i was getting a drink and looked out the window which faces east.
in the south east a mile or more away was a bright light that seemed to be blinking, so i watched thinking it was almost as if a string of lights were blinking in sequence.  after maybe 10 minutes i went back to my computer.  maybe 45 min. later i went back to take a peek and the light was now a bare quarter mile away, hanging ove the pasture area, at an elevation of (as a guess) 10-20,000 ft.  there was no soound that i could hear.
now i could clearly see that the lights were 'running' around the center of whatever was there.  after about 5 min. the lights stopped and just two steady lights, like auto headlights appeared.  they remained for 3-4 seconds, then the 'running lights' appeared again.  i opened the door for a clearer view and watched for nearly an hour while the running lights alternated with the auto headlight sequence.  all this time the light did not move across the sky as a star or plane or satellite would.  it was still doing it's thing when i decided to go on to bed if it wasn't going to put on any new antics.
could hese two incidences be related in some way.
content.summary: I saw a bright light descending toward the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Era la ma���ana del 7 de julio de 1999, y como todos los d���as se estaba transmitiendo el noticiero info7 por el canal 7 de tv azteca noreste. iban a ser las 7:30am cuando de pronto fue captado el avistamiento de un objeto volador no identificado (ovni) sobre el lado oriental del cerro de la silla. el cielo estaba semi despejado, con pocas nubes, la temperatura ambiente era de 22���c. el avistamiento dur��� m���s de 10 minutos, casi 20 minutos, y de pronto el ovni desapareci���. 
todo pudimos verlo por la televisi���n, ya que fue transmitido en vivo por el noticiero info7. el reporte sali��� al d���a siguiente en las noticias.
content.summary: Un ovni sobre el cerro de la silla: el llamado "ovni azteca".

content.detailedDescription: The night of the occurrence myself, husband and two children were in our pool. i had looked up (as an avid star gazer) and saw a very bright singular light, miles away in the sky. it was similar to that of the spot from a helicopter. i pointed it out to my family... and stated that i wonder what it's looking for. i continued to think that it was a helicopter until it got a little bit closer and i noticed it didn't have any of the other lighting required for that type of craft. as it came closer its' light went black and it stopped- just hovered over us at an angle. at this point we all had realized this was not a helicopter and we were trying to come up with an explanation. we could still see the shadow of the object in the night sky and at that point there was one rotary redish-orange light rotating slowly around the saucer/spherical shadow. it was within a range at this point that any engine would be heard... there wasn't a sound. as it maintained its descent we had decided to hop in the car as we lost it in the silhoutte of the neighbors roof top. we could not locate it again. i can honestly say that i have never had a more unexplainable occurence within my lifetime. this was not a remote control toy. it was miles up in the sky when we first saw it. the size of the object is truly unknown as we were unsure of the actual flight height of the object when it came closer.
content.summary: Medina, ohio*sighting*the object was disc like but possibly spherical. it had a slow moving  and silent descent.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed over 2 hours at night. was silent, was slow at first. would dissapear, then re-appear as fast rate with increased size and brightness. i carry a degree in both meteorology, and physics...And this is nothing i can explain.
content.summary: Fast, floating. silent

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were finishing up a night shift at a truck loading dock. we had loaded a trailer truck  were locking it down in the dark truck yard when we observed a dark sphere with a row of lights flashing around it pass slowly over us from west to east. my partner commented at first that it must be some silent kind of helicopter, as there was no sound.  then two smaller orbs burst from the larger one and took off in 180 degree directions, north and south.  moments later the larger orb appeared to shoot straight up into the night sky and disappear.  we looked at each other and said we would never speak about this to anyone.  i have not heard from my partner  in over 30 years, but i know he must remember it too.
content.summary: Silent flashing sphere appeared to hover, dispatched two smaller orbs

content.detailedDescription:
Just east of downtown, moving stars are a given. i can also see silvery images during the day. they appear connected to mt. wilson as when it is lit up there is heavy activity and conversely no activity when wilson looks dormant.

also red and blue swaths of light flash eerily in the sky.

there are over 50 everynight. i can't believe no one else is seeing this. i had a friend watch with me and confirmed that i wasn't seeing things.

the first time, about a month ago, i made a serious attempt to stay focused on these star like objects a helicopter flew right over me not more than 75 feet off the ground. i ran in the house and the copter circled the house and shone its spotlight in my windows, then left.

when commercial airlines fly over, the lights flash 100  % of the time and seem to lead the aircraft across the san gabriel mountains.

i feel this activity is not unidentified; i think it is us military and the problem with this is that the military and our representatives in government has not informed the public. due to this sentivity i will not provide any information about me or specific local.

if you go outside and see a mass of stars, know that in itself is unusial

for la. once you've seen a star disappear or flash like a shooting star, keep scanning the sky as there are many of them in the air.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Occuring nightly and many, many moving, dashing stars

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke, i looked up at the stars, and i could see what i thought, looked just like a star, moving slowly north west. the object had no flashing or blinking lights .For the amount of time i watched the object, it had to have been moving fast to travel as far as it did. i cant estimate the speed. but the object was too big just disappear. the size of the object did not change as it traveled.  when i discovered the object, i did not know if it was moving or not.
content.summary: Look like a star looked far away. and move away from where i was standing

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the beach, looking east over the atlantic ocean as the sun was setting behind me.  looking south, i noticed a craft moving north at a pretty decent speed - say 60 m.P.H, based on the how long it takes me to drive the distance i saw it fly.

coast guard helicopters and small planes dragging advertisements fly up and down the coast pretty frequently and i always stop and watch as they fly by - just for fun.

when i first saw the craft i figured it was a helicopter, but as it got closer, i started thinking it was a cluster of balloons that had gotten away.  but then i realized that it wasn't spinning or moving up or down as balloons normally do in flight.  it was flying straight without any noticeable change in speed or elevation.

the part of it hanging down ( which i thought would be strings ) was thicker than string would be and was pointing directly downward, and not back toward the south like i would have expected if the balloons were being pushed by the wind.  

 it didn't make any noticeable noise.  there was a bit of wind, but not enough to drown out the voices of the kids playing about 50 yards down-wind from me.

also, as far as witnesses go: there were at least 20-30 people on the beach that i could see and i watched as the craft flew past the boardwalk in point pleasant.   and lastly, there was a couple walking north on the beach about 30 yards from me when it flew by.  they stopped to watch it too, and afterward they asked if i knew what that was.  i said, "no, and i won't say anything, if you don't."    we laughed, and then said to each other, "no, really, what was that?"

sorry i didn't have a camera or anything to take pictures.  i bet someone in point pleasant did though, so i'm going to check flickr and youtube in a couple days for a post.
content.summary: It looked like a cluster of balloons that had gotten away, but was more stable in flight

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful night so my grandpa, my uncle and i were looking at the stars sitting on our bench in the front yard.Then the object just hovered over us heading north west.We instantly thought it was a u.F.O.It didn't really change our lives much.
content.summary: Clear night 3or 4clouds then it just hovered over us

content.detailedDescription:
Window by the bed: i woke and looked out to see object; woke wife who confirmed sight. it was spinning clockwise: outer shell spinning round a center (spinning part was faint brown; center silver). object passed between trees.50.0.0 to 210.0.0.

this is actually my second report of this event; i always felt that first report may not have been received and i have been meaning to repeat report. sorry that it took so long.

back in 1992, i told marge christersen about sighting.
content.summary: Spinning passing east to south, between trees

content.detailedDescription:
1 sometimes 2 red glowing and pulsating objects near bristol/avonmouth. visible from south wales, these objects were just red pulsating glowing sphere looking. seemed to move across and up in roughly 5-10 minute loops, seemed to also move further away as each reached greater altitude. occasional cloud cover and strong moon in backdrop has made videoing poor quality, and sadly i didn't think of getting any camera pics, but very eery to watch. only sort of explanation i could think of was some helicopters but they surely don't just glow red - all over and definitely not with the luminesence that these constantly had!
circling formation was made by both, but one object was mainly observed. distance of circling probably several miles.  distance away  - a guess would be anywhere from perhaps 10miles south east of caldicot area. circling motion was smooth, not any rapid movements or spurts and in a east to west motion and climbing up and slightly away from me before vanishing, reappearing again from the east - obscurred by nearby rooftop of a house.
content.summary: 1 sometimes 2 red glowing and pulsating objects near bristol/avonmouth area for up to 1hour

content.detailedDescription: I was lounging in my hot tub facing the southern sky. the sun was down and it was close to being dark when i notice a dark object appear in the southern sky heading nnw over the frisco texas area. it was about 8:50 pm. the object appeared to be black or dark gray and round with no lights whatsoever. i thouth that strange since aircraft have lights flashing at this time of the evening. from the time it appeared in the sky to the time it dissapearred was about 15 seconds. i also witnessed a vapor trail of some kind just before it was gone. i thought nothing of the speed until a couple of days later when an airplane appeared and took a similar nnw path and took over 4 minutes to dissapear.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo while lounging in my hot tub

content.detailedDescription:
Was walking my two dogs with my 15 year old son around the block.  i noticed the ufo in the western sky (~45 degree agle up) and pointed it out to my son, who said it was a blimp.  i told him it wasn't.  i went inside my home to grab my binoculars to verify the shape of the object.  
after showing the object to my son, and convinced him it wasn't a blimp,i came inside to grab my digital camera with a 12x zoom.  i shot these pictures at max. zoom of 12x over about 5-10 minutes.  
i lost site of the object behind the clouds.
content.summary: Saw ufo while walking dogs, came inside to grab camera

content.detailedDescription: See report filed on 7/19/08
content.summary: Sent this in last night and computer froze when filling out next form.

content.detailedDescription:
I was practicing karate on my patio. i stopped for a minute or two. i typically see a lot of commercial air traffic from o'hare. but, this time i look in the south sky and see what appears to be a star moving south to north at the speed of a jet. it was very, very high. 

it was about 60 degrees south when i first saw it and i watch it till it was directly above me, which is when i lost sight of it. i continued watching for it to reappear just north of where i lost sight of it. but after about two/three minutes of scanning the sky, it was nowhere to be seen. 

then i started working out again. after about five minutes, i looked up at that last spot again and there it was, again traveling directly north, till it very slightly turned west.

it was way to high to expect to hear any sound. i'm very surprised that i didn't find it again far north in the sky. instead, i found it to reappear just north of where i initially lost sight of it. do satellites stop? do high flying military planes, turn off their lights, circle for several minutes and then turn their lights on again and resume course? this would be a likely explanation. i do not think the light looked like an airplane light. it looked like a star.
content.summary: Traveled south to north, disappeared and was visible several minutes later from last visible spot

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to have a smoke and saw this green thing flying and quickly got my wife and when she came out it was gone
content.summary: Green ball like thing flying through the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north bound on hoover rd in or around sterling heights warren area north of 12 mile when i saw an object moving west to east that was rectangular and greyish looked like it was wider at one point than another.  i could see wisps of clouds moving by the object but i did not see anything in front of this object. the object looked at least 80 fot long perhaps over 150ft long.  my daughter was in the car as well but saw the object at a more oblique angle and only for an instant.  the object appeared to be moving about 100mph perhaps more, but it was hard to tell.  the object was about 3/4 the size of a crayon held at arms length, a little bit fatter though, and more angular and no sharp point.  it was early afternoon and there were lots of people driving about.  someone else had to see this better than we.

my first thought was that this was a plane pulling an aerial banner, that was greyish, and the pilot thought he would be sneaky and fly his plane just inside the cloud cover, towing the banner behind him hanging under the clouds, so that it looked like the banner was floating in mid-air.  i checked out aerial advertising companies and many had a clause of bad weather, or bad flight days, and how they would not fly a banner on those days and waste the advertising dollars. it looked like the ufo had a three dimensional quality to it though, like it wasnt a banner.  on the otherhand, the object was slightly tilted up.  planes that tow banners are above and of course in front of the object, so if the plane was in the clouds the banner might look like it was moving under its own power.  i did not see any cables and since i was in my car i could not tell if it made any noise. if this was an aerial banner and i was the advertiser, i would be upset that my banner was flown quite low and pretty much in the clouds.

maybe some crack mufon investigator could find out whether this was an aerial banner or not, because if it wasnt being towed by an airplane, we have nothing in civilian or military aircraft that look ever remotely like this object.  it looked the size a flying grey duplex apartment building.  this one might be easy to solve or perplexing if no aerial banners were flown on that day.  it would take some phone calls to figure out what this was, and i would feel wierd about calling a company asking them for info they might not want to divulge, especially to some civilian who thought he saw a ufo.  if anyone else saw this on the day and hour in question, report what you saw!
content.summary: Ufo or aerial banner on a cloudy overcast day?

content.detailedDescription:
I am belatedly (for sure) reporting this, but i am doing so now because a) it was the most remarkable thing that i have seen in my lifetime of 67 years, b) i haven't been able to locate any other references to it having been seen by others, and c) it has continued to perplex me for years. 

my wife and i were outside our home at dusk (not dark) in thorntown, indiana in august of, i believe 1968, when we saw an orange, glowing object in the distance northeast of us (toward kokomo).  as we watched, the object started zigzagging across the sky at extremely rapid speeds.  it was obvious that the object was at a considerable distance from us, and the rapid changes in direction and the speed of transit were incredibly and incomprehensibly fast.  

we watched for several minutes as the object got closer to us, and, remarkably, went almost directly overhead at a low altitude as might be expected of a light plane.  as the object moved over us, its color shifted from orange to a yellowish-orange and the appearance changed from a glowing object to a noticeably larger circle which could best be described as "looking into a jet engine exhaust" at relatively close range.  up to that point the object had been noiseless, but some seconds after it had passed overhead, a sound comparable to that of a jet engine was heard.  the object subsequently disappeared rather quickly into the distance.  at no point was there any object definition.  although i would trust that the description above would reveal this, any speculation that this was some sort of light phenomenon would be completely inconsistent with what was seen.

as i recall, there was either no, or minimal, mention of this in the newspapers at the time.  i recall reporting this to either bunker hill afb or blue book (it's been a while), but no-one ever followed up with me.  i'm a scientist and would expect there to be a logical explanation of this phenomenon (if not "perfectly" logical). i have described this phenomenon to a few people who appear to accept it as objective fact, but, at the same time, it's obvious that it is difficult to appreciate the remarkable nature of this incident unless you were there.  i've looked for similar reports, but i haven't really found any.
content.summary: Orange, glowing, darting object at a distance flew overhead, changed appearance, and souned like jet thereafter.

content.detailedDescription: It was 7:oo in the morning when i was walking with my peers to the chow hall in the mountians of larkspur colorado.It was somewhat misty outside and a bit chilly.I was currently going to a private school for boys at the emily griffith center for children and young adults.Everyday before a meal,my peers and i would have to walk in strict line transitions to the cafeteria from our lodge.One morning,as we stood in line in front of the cafeteria,i decided to look up at the misty sky and saw a shiny silver egg shaped thing about 100 to 200 feet above us.It was floating completely still and made no niose at all.I stood there mystified and wondered what it could be.I watched this thing for a good 5 or 7 minutes when it suddenly zipped away into the sky,like a bullet.I say bullet because that is the only way that i can describe the speed in wich it shot away.When that happened i started to tell my peers,but nobody saw what i saw.Seeing this thing totally shocked and excited me.I couldnt stop talking about it all through breakfast.I had a gut feeling right away that this was a ufo,once it had zipped away into the atmosphere.About 2 hours later,during our field activity,i was even more wierded out,when black helocopters circled over our campus for a good 30 to 45 minutes.I was somewhat skeptical about these sort of things until this happened,but not anymore.
content.summary: Saw it in the sky while going to chow hall.
